body:
Comment 6 by **mstplbrg**: 
This is on the following machine:

$ uname -a
Linux abel 3.15-trunk-armmp-lpae #1 SMP Debian 3.15.1-1~exp1 (2014-06-20) armv7l
GNU/Linux

But as you can see at
https://buildd.debian.org/status/package.php?p=golang-go.tools&suite=unstable, it still
affects armel, armhf, i386.
